name: Traditional Healer
description:
Game Summary

Narrative : Traditional Healer is a casual game that revolves around healing patients using traditional medicine from Indonesia.

Look and Feel :

Theme : Health

Genre : Casual

Art Style : Cartoon

Camera : Top down view 3D

Target Platform : PC

Target Customer : Player from 13 - 60+ years old.

Single Player : Yes

Multiplayer : No

Business Model : Free to play, In App Purchase

Tech Stack : Unity, Blender

Language : English

Game Mechanics

In this game, players serve patients by giving traditional Indonesian medicines.

Game Goals

Players will need to diagnose incoming patients and make medicines to cure the patient. Player needs to cure the target amount of patients before the timer runs out.

Diagnostic Phase

The player must guess the disease the patient is suffering from, so player can give the right medicine.

Medicine Dispensing Phase

Players dispensing medicine based on the results of the diagnosis made.

Gestures

Controls

  • Movement

    Using ‘WASD Movement’

    • w to walk up
    • a to walk left
    • s to walk down
    • d to walk right

  • Action

    • f button to read the patient’s complaint
    • q button to make the medicine

Basic Animation

List of animation :

  • Walk
  • Diagnose patient
  • Dispensing medicine
  • Give medicine to patient

Win Condition

The player must cure a number of patients before the timer runs out to win the stage

Loss Condition

The player failed to cure the target amount of patients before the timer runs out. If the player gives the wrong medicine then the timer will decrease
